Protections! Once you have more income , then get more base on this guide. ​Once you're ready to buy, read this first: https://blog.seedly.sg/working-adults-4-frequently-asked-insurance-questions/and what to ask an agent: https://blog.seedly.sg/5-questions-to-ask-when-getting-an-insurance-plan/​Do read up more about insurance daily in bite size per blog post basis while travelling using your smartphone here so that it helps you understand what you need  and the different insurance available so that you will not be short-changed and get sufficient coverage: https://blog.seedly.sg/category/insurance/basics-of-insurance/​Hope it helps you more as it helps me a lot ! :) Cheers! :) 0 comments1
